executable.title: Execution Model Tour
executable.description: Shows one of each type of parameter.

file.name: inputFileVarNoFileExtensions
file.description: Input file, with no file extensions specified, so all files selectable.
file.label: File, no extensions specified.

file.name: inputFileVarListCommaSeparated
file.description: Input file, where a correct comma separated list of .txt and .mat are specified, which should include the first dot, but should not include any asterisks.
file.label: Correctly specified .txt or .mat file.

file.name: inputFileVarListCommaSeparatedWithINCORRECTAdditionOfAsterisks
file.description: Input file, where the XML has incorrect addition of asterisks.
file.label: Incorrectly specified .txt or .mat file.

file.name: inputFileVarListCommaSeparatedWithINCORRECTMissingFirstDot
file.description: Input file, where the XML has incorrectly missed the first dot of the file extensions.
file.label: Incorrectly specified .txt or .mat file.

file.name: outputFileVarNoFileExtensions
file.description: Output file, with no file extensions specified, so all files selectable.
file.label: Output file, no extensions specified.

file.name: outputFileVarListCommaSeparated
file.description: Output file, where a correct comma separated list of .txt and .mat are specified, which should include the first dot, but should not include any asterisks.
file.label: Correctly specified .txt or .mat file.

file.name: outputFileVarListCommaSeparatedWithINCORRECTAdditionOfAsterisks
file.description: Output file, where the XML has incorrect addition of asterisks.
file.label: Incorrectly specified .txt or .mat file.

file.name: outputFileVarListCommaSeparatedWithINCORRECTMissingFirstDot
file.description: Output file, where the XML has incorrectly missed the first dot of the file extensions.
file.label: Incorrectly specified .txt or .mat file.

image.name: inputImageVarNoFileExtensions
image.description: Input image, with no file extensions specified, so all files selectable.
image.label: Image, no extensions specified.

image.name: inputImageVarListCommaSeparated
image.description: Input image, where a correct comma separated list is specified, which should include the first dot, but should not include any asterisks.
image.label: Correctly specified .nii or .nrrd or .nii.gz image.

image.name: inputImageVarListCommaSeparatedWithINCORRECTAdditionOfAsterisks
image.description: Input image, where the XML has incorrect addition of asterisks.
image.label: Incorrectly specified .nii or .nrrd or .nii.gz image.

image.name: inputImageVarListCommaSeparatedWithINCORRECTMissingFirstDot
image.description: Input file, where the XML has incorrectly missed the first dot of the file extensions.
image.label: Incorrectly specified .nii or .nrrd or .nii.gz image.

image.name: outputImageVarNoFileExtensions
image.description: Output image, with no file extensions specified, so all files selectable.
image.label: Image, no extensions specified.

image.name: outputImageVarListCommaSeparated
image.description: Output image, where a correct comma separated is specified, which should include the first dot, but should not include any asterisks.
image.label: Correctly specified .nii or .nrrd or .nii.gz image.

image.name: outputImageVarListCommaSeparatedWithINCORRECTAdditionOfAsterisks
image.description: Output image, where the XML has incorrect addition of asterisks.
image.label: Incorrectly specified .nii or .nrrd or .nii.gz image.

image.name: outputImageVarListCommaSeparatedWithINCORRECTMissingFirstDot
image.description: Output file, where the XML has incorrectly missed the first dot of the file extensions.
image.label: Incorrectly specified .nii or .nrrd or .nii.gz image.

parameters.label: Geometry I/O Parameters
parameters.description: Various Geometry I/O parameters, which are for things like vtkPolyData.

geometry.name: inputGeometryVarNoFileExtensions
geometry.description: Input geometry, with no file extensions specified, so all files selectable.
geometry.label: Geometry, no extensions specified.

geometry.name: inputGeometryVarListCommaSeparated
geometry.description: Input geometry, where a correct comma separated list is specified, which should include the first dot, but should not include any asterisks.
geometry.label: Correctly specified .vtk or .vtp file.

geometry.name: inputGeometryVarListCommaSeparatedWithINCORRECTAdditionOfAsterisks
geometry.description: Input geometry, where the XML has incorrect addition of asterisks.
geometry.label: Incorrectly specified .vtk or .vtp file.

geometry.name: inputGeometryVarListCommaSeparatedWithINCORRECTMissingFirstDot
geometry.description: Input geometry, where the XML has incorrectly missed the first dot of the file extensions.
geometry.label: Incorrectly specified .vtk or .vtp file.

geometry.name: outputGeometryVarNoFileExtensions
geometry.description: Output geometry, with no file extensions specified, so all files selectable.
geometry.label: Geometry, no extensions specified.

geometry.name: outputGeometryVarListCommaSeparated
geometry.description: Output geometry, where a correct comma separated list is specified, which should include the first dot, but should not include any asterisks.
geometry.label: Correctly specified .vtk or .vtp file.

geometry.name: outputGeometryVarListCommaSeparatedWithINCORRECTAdditionOfAsterisks
geometry.description: Output geometry, where the XML has incorrect addition of asterisks.
geometry.label: Incorrectly specified .vtk or .vtp file.

geometry.name: outputGeometryVarListCommaSeparatedWithINCORRECTMissingFirstDot
geometry.description: Output geometry, where the XML has incorrectly missed the first dot of the file extensions.
geometry.label: Incorrectly specified .vtk or .vtp file.
